title: Delay on North-South Line due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 北干线轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan kerana kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: தட செயலிழப்பு காரணமாக வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதம்

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Normal train service from #Bishan to #Khatib towards #JurongEast has resumed.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimate 5 mins additional travel time from #Bishan to #Khatib towards Jurong East due to a track fault.
[NSL] UPDATE: South Bound normal service resumed. Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #Bishan to #Khatib towards Jurong East.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #Bishan to #Khatib towards Jurong East. We are working to recover service.
[NSL] DELAY: Estimate 10 mins additional travel time between Bishan and Khatib due to a track fault.
